As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 2 life or {E}.
Target opponent separates their hand into two face-down piles. Look at one of the piles and choose a card from it. That player discards the chosen card unless they discard a card at random from the other pile and have you get {E}{E}. [i](The opponent makes the piles and you choose which pile to look at.)[/i]
